solution_line_template: He wants to buy a ${game_cost} game and ${candy_cost} of candy so {game_cost} + {candy_cost} = $<<{game_cost}+{candy_cost}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
He will make ${hourly_rate} per hour of babysitting and will work {hours_worked} hours so {hourly_rate} * {hours_worked} = $<<{hourly_rate}*{hours_worked}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
He made ${total_earnings} and spent ${total_cost} so {total_earnings}-{total_cost} = $<<{total_earnings}-{total_cost}={money_left_over}>>{money_left_over} left over
